name: FlowSheet
description: Library to work with VexFlow without needing to know how it works

scripts.dev: npm run tslint && tsc -m es6 --outDir dist
scripts.test: npm run clean && jest && npm run demo:test && npm run clean
scripts.test:coverage: npm run clean && jest --coverage && npm run demo:test && npm run clean
scripts.demo:test: npm run build && cd demo && npm install && npm run add-self && npm test

author: christianmartinez@hotmail.es
